title: Solve for $$t$$ in the x(t) Equation
text: Solve for $$t$$ in the x(t) equation, we have $$t=\frac{1}{2} x+\frac{1}{2}$$.

title: Substitute $$t$$ Into the y(t) Equation
text: Substitute $$t=\frac{1}{2} x+\frac{1}{2}$$ into the y(t) equation, we have $$y=5\left(\frac{1}{2} x+\frac{1}{2}\right)=\frac{5}{2} x+\frac{5}{2}$$
